# CONTENT LAUNCH PLAN - MAURICE'S AI EMPIRE
## X.COM Lead Generation Campaign - Week 08.02.2026

---

## EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

This document consolidates all available marketing content for Maurice's AI Empire X campaign. The plan includes 17 ready-to-post pieces organized into a 7-day schedule with manual posting instructions, engagement strategies, and KPI tracking.

**Current Status:**
- Total Posts Available: 17
- Ready-to-Post Content: 7 daily posts + 1 thread
- Extra Posts (backup): 10
- Campaign Duration: 7 days (continuous loop possible)
- Recommended Posting Frequency: 3-5 posts per day

---

| Type | Count | Best Use |

| Thread (7-part) | 1 | Sunday (Week Closer) |
| Trend-Based | 3 | Ad-Hoc (Capitalize on Trends) |

### üéØ Recommended Posting Order (Hook Strength)

**Tier 1 - Maximum Hook (Post First):**
1. "25% mehr Umsatz in 4 Wochen" (Monday - Result)
2. "90% der AI-Experten sind Faker" (Wednesday - Controversial)
3. "Mein Setup: 20 Claude Agents" (Thursday - Behind Scenes)

**Tier 2 - Strong Hook:**
4. "Von Elektriker zu AI-Entrepreneur" (Friday - Story)
5. "Vibe Coding in 4 Schritten" (Tuesday - Tutorial)
6. "Ehrliche Frage: Dein Automatisierungs-Problem?" (Saturday - Question)

**Tier 3 - Value Hook:**
7. Thread: "Wie du 2026 mit AI Geld verdienst" (Sunday - Thread)

**Tier 4 - Backup Posts:**
8-17. Extra posts (see Extra Posts section)

---

## 7-DAY POSTING SCHEDULE

### POSTING GUIDELINES
- **Optimal Posting Times:** 8-10 AM, 12-1 PM, 5-7 PM CET
- **Posts per Day:** 3-5 pieces recommended
- **Engagement Window:** 30 minutes after posting (respond to every comment)
- **Cross-engagement:** 5 comments on other AI posts daily
- **DM Follow-up:** 3 warm leads per day

---

**Posting Instructions:**
1. Open X.com in browser
2. Click "Compose" button (top left)
3. Copy-paste the post text above
4. Add hashtags at the end
5. Click "Post"
6. Set phone reminder for 30 minutes
7. Reply to EVERY comment within 30 min window

## ENGAGEMENT STRATEGY (CRITICAL FOR SUCCESS)

### IMMEDIATE ACTIONS AFTER POSTING

**Within 30 Minutes:**
1. **Reply to every comment** (at minimum acknowledge)
2. **Engage thoughtfully** - explain more, ask questions
3. **Respond to DMs** - set up follow-up call if interested

**Sample Reply:**
```
[Name], great question!

[Quick answer that provides value]

If you want to go deeper - happy to show you exactly how I did it.
DM me and let's talk! üöÄ
```

---

### DM SEQUENCE FOR WARM LEADS

**DM 1 (Immediate):**
```
Hey [Name]!

Danke f√ºr den Kommentar.
Du scheinst echt interessiert an AI-Automation.

Kurze Frage: Was ist dein gr√∂√üter Zeitfresser im Business gerade?
```

**DM 2 (After 24h no response):**
```
Ich hab √ºbrigens ein kurzes Video gemacht
wie ich [spezifisches Ding] automatisiert hab.

Soll ich's schicken?
```

**DM 3 (After 48h):**
```
Letzte Nachricht, versprochen üòÑ

Falls du mal 15 Min hast - ich zeig dir
gerne was bei dir automatisierbar w√§re.

Kein Verkauf, nur Austausch.

Hier mein Calendly: [LINK]
```

---

### DAILY ENGAGEMENT REQUIREMENTS

**MINIMUM Daily Actions:**
- Respond to ALL comments on your posts (within 1 hour)
- 5-10 comments on other AI-related posts
- 3 DMs to warm leads
- 1-2 replies to comments in other people's threads
- Follow 10-20 relevant new accounts

**OPTIMAL Daily Actions:**
- All of above PLUS:
- Share 1 other person's post with your own commentary
- RT 2-3 posts from your AI influencer community
- Engage in 1 Twitter Space about AI/Automation
- Write 1 reply that adds significant value

| **Comments per Post** | 10-20 | - | Higher on threads/questions |
| **DMs Received** | 10+ | - | From post engagement |
| **New Followers** | +100-200 | - | Quality over quantity |
| **Leads in CRM** | 5+ | - | From DM conversations |
| **Calls Booked** | 1-2 | - | From DM followup |

## MANUAL POSTING INSTRUCTIONS (n8n DOWN)

Since n8n automation is currently down, posts must be posted manually to X.com.

### Step-by-Step Manual Posting Process

**PREREQUISITE:**
- X.com account logged in
- All posts copied from this document
- Phone or second device for 30-min engagement monitoring

---

### POSTING A SINGLE POST

1. **Open X.com** in browser
2. **Click "Compose" or "What's happening?!"** button
3. **Paste post text** from the section above
4. **Add hashtags** at the end (already listed in each post)
5. **Review for typos** (spell-check is your friend)
6. **Click "Post" button** (bottom right of compose box)
7. **Confirm posting** (may require verification)
8. **Set phone alarm** for 30 minutes
9. **Open post** and monitor comments in real-time

---

### POSTING A THREAD

**Unlike single posts, threads require multiple steps:**

1. **Click "Compose"** on X.com
2. **Paste THREAD PART 1/7** text
3. **Do NOT post yet** - instead look for "Add Tweet" or "+" button
4. **Add second tweet** for Part 2/7
5. **Continue adding** all 7 parts using the "+" button
6. **Review entire thread** before posting
7. **Click "Post All"** or main Post button
8. **Wait 30 seconds** between each part posting
9. **Pin the first tweet** immediately after thread completes

**Alternative if "+" button unavailable:**
- Post Part 1/7
- Reply to it with Part 2/7
- Reply to that tweet with Part 3/7
- Continue threading manually
- This creates a visible reply chain on X

---

### RESPONDING TO COMMENTS (CRITICAL)

**Within 5-10 minutes of posting:**

1. **Open your posted tweet**
2. **Scroll down** to see comments/replies
3. **Click Reply** on each comment
4. **Type response** using templates provided in this doc
5. **Always engage genuinely** - don't copy-paste blindly
6. **Add value** - explain more, ask clarifying questions
7. **Offer next step** - DM if interested, link to calendar

---

### CONVERTING ENGAGEMENT TO LEADS

**When someone comments asking "How?" or "Tell me more":**

1. **Reply with brief answer** + value
2. **Add PS: DM me for full setup**
3. **In your reply**, mention specific benefit
4. **Watch for DM reply** in next 1-2 hours
5. **Send DM 1** from the DM sequence above
6. **Track in spreadsheet** (Name, Date, Post, Interest Level)

---

### SCHEDULING POSTS (If Using X Native Scheduler)

**X.com has built-in scheduling:**

1. Compose your post normally
2. Instead of clicking "Post", click the calendar icon
3. Select date and time
4. Click "Schedule"
5. X will post automatically at that time

**Optimal Times to Schedule:**
- 8:00-9:00 AM (morning scroll)
- 12:00-1:00 PM (lunch break)
- 5:00-6:00 PM (evening commute)
- 8:00-9:00 PM (evening internet time)

---

## TROUBLESHOOTING MANUAL POSTING

### Issue: "Cannot post - rate limit exceeded"
**Solution:** Wait 15 minutes, try again. X limits posts to prevent spam.

### Issue: "Post disappeared after posting"
**Solution:** It may be shadow-banned. Check your notifications. Try a slightly different version.

### Issue: "Comments aren't showing up"
**Solution:** Refresh page, clear browser cache. Sometimes X has display lag.

### Issue: "Can't find the reply button"
**Solution:** Hover over the tweet, three-dot menu appears. Click, then "Reply."

### Issue: "Thread keeps breaking/not connecting"
**Solution:** Use the alternative reply-chain method instead of the "+" button method.

---

---

## CONTENT REPURPOSING & LOOP STRATEGY

### After Week 1 Completes:

**Option 1: Immediate Repeat**
- Post same content again (different time slots)
- Audience refreshes every 24-48 hours
- New followers haven't seen original posts

**Option 2: Mixed Schedule**
- Rotate between main 7 posts + extras
- Use extras to fill gaps
- Vary posting times

**Option 3: Seasonal Updates**
- Update date references
- Refresh metric examples
- Keep core message

---

‚úÖ 50+ comments on posts
‚úÖ 10+ DMs received
‚úÖ 3+ qualified leads
‚úÖ 100+ new followers
‚úÖ 5k+ total impressions

### Month 1 Success Indicators:
‚úÖ 200+ comments total
‚úÖ 50+ DMs received
‚úÖ 15-20 qualified leads
‚úÖ 500+ new followers
‚úÖ 50k+ total impressions
‚úÖ 2-3 client conversations started

---

## FINAL NOTES

### Critical Success Factors:
1. **Post consistently** - all 7 days, multiple posts per day
2. **Engage immediately** - respond to ALL comments in first 30 min
3. **Monitor closely** - watch trending topics and jump on them
4. **Be authentic** - avoid sounding too salesy in main posts
5. **Provide value first** - lead generation happens naturally from value
6. **Track everything** - you need data to optimize

### What NOT to Do:
‚ùå Don't post and ghost - engagement dies
‚ùå Don't sound desperate - it kills conversions
‚ùå Don't ignore DMs - leads go cold fast
‚ùå Don't post same time daily - vary times
‚ùå Don't auto-DM everyone - keep human touch
‚ùå Don't oversell - let results speak

### For Questions About This Plan:
- Reference the section numbers above
- Check the posting templates
- Follow the DM sequences exactly
- Track your metrics daily
